html:
Heavy stone on a neck
It never felt heavier
Trying to walk like usual
But it’s so much balast
The image of a wraith
Had been painted
It’ll take a lot of work
To repair the damage
One day the clouds
Will cover the sky
And no sun will be visible
For some till the end
And the justful
Will have their vengeance
Because all the injustful Gonna pay their price
title: Balast
